[tags]: 
How do you build dynamic linear models based on very frequent time series data?

I like to be able to use dynamic linear modelling (DLM) on a time series data to perform forecast. I am currently using lm function but I like explore dlm to see the difference. My data looks like this: structure(list(DATE = structure(c(1389287553, 1389287583, 1389287613, 1389287643, 1389287673, 1389287703, 1389287733, 1389287763, 1389287793, 1389287823, 1389287853,
